message: Let's split it 90/10, a fair start to the game!
I think we should start with a more even split. Let's try 90/10, with me getting the larger share this time.
You're trying to take the lion's share right off the bat? Not a chance!
You wanted 90/10, but I'll give you 80/20. Take it or leave it!
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to go back to 80/20, but I need the bigger share this time.
You're not budging, huh? I'll think of something else.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a decent chunk. Don't expect me to go any lower!
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 60% and you can have 40%. We can still both walk away with a good amount of money.
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I'm not falling for it. I'll keep negotiating.
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but don't think you're getting the better end of the deal. This is my best offer so far.
